players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Wow, Alice is dead already. That was fast. We need info. Bob, Charlie—what were your initial reads on Alice yesterday or pre-game? Detective, if you have a solid red check, now’s the time to hint it."
Charlie: "Bob, I think we need to be cautious about who we trust. I’m getting some suspicious vibes from Diana."
You: "Charlie, I hear you. But let's not jump to conclusions too quickly. We need more information. Diana, why do you think Alice was targeted first?"
You: "Detective, if you have any information, please share it now. We need to work together to make an informed decision."

Diana: "Charlie, that’s a quick shade throw—why me? Bob asked a good Q: who gains from Alice dying? She was quiet, low info. Feels like a kill to stir paranoia. Detective, if you have a green on anyone, say it."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
